title: Ola becomes only EV maker to secure PLI certification for four electric scooters
description: Ola Electric's S1 X 3 kWh and S1 X 4 kWh scooters received certification for the Production Linked Incentive (PLI) Scheme. The company is now the sole two-wheeler EV manufacturer to achieve PLI compliance for four products.
